### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://zpaste.net/p/eyhxt](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fzpaste.net%2Fp%2Feyhxt) ### Comment > recapcha cant solve and infinite loading with adguard enabled, this in any browser, i tried in edge, chrome, firefox and opera gx and in all of them appears the issue. kaspersky and windows isn't the problem, i already test in win 10 and with kaspersky disabled. comment.body: @Alex-302 The reporter mentioned stealth mode (UA), are these all needed? I know many user use User rules to hide annoyances on the game and `$elemhide` will disable them too.
